Featured

  • Featured Content
Main

Image

Allows editors to embed an image and caption within site content.

Example

Open this example in new window

Macro


{{ image({
    src: "https://digital-transformation.hee.nhs.uk/binaries/content/gallery/digital-transformation/blogs/vr-headsets.jpg",
    alt: "Nulla vitae est vel metus aliquam pharetra",
    caption: "Pellentesque sit amet nulla a nibh"
}) }}

HTML


<figure class="nhsuk-image">
    <img class="nhsuk-image__img" src="https://digital-transformation.hee.nhs.uk/binaries/content/gallery/digital-transformation/blogs/vr-headsets.jpg" alt="Nulla vitae est vel metus aliquam pharetra">
    <figcaption class="nhsuk-image__caption"> Pellentesque sit amet nulla a nibh </figcaption>
</figure>
